erjang
Class ENative

java.lang.Object
  erjang.ENative
Direct Known Subclasses:
Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native, Native
public abstract class ENative
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for native code. To implement a native (BIF) for module named foo, create a subclass of this named erjang.m.foo.Native. See Native (the BIFs for ets), which is the appointed "good style to copy" for coding conventions.

Constructor Detail

ENative

public ENative()
Method Detail

getNativeClasses

public java.lang.Class<?>[] getNativeClasses()
if you want to put the BIFs in multiple class files, you can tell which class files here. Normally that is not needed, but the module erlang has so many BIFs that it is very inconvenient to have them in one large file.
